about.title: About Alar veliyeedu
about.p1: New books are important for any language. Reprinting valuable old books is just as important. Many good books disappear over time and are rarely seen again.
about.p2: Alar Veliyeedu was started with a clear goal: to republish important literature and research books that truly support human progress and the growth of knowledge, and to introduce them to the next generation.
